channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bluesky says 1 million people signed up for the platform in last 24 hours
item.description: Bluesky said Thursday evening that over 1 million people signed up for the platform in the last 24 hours, making it one of the busiest days for the co...

item.title: Meta Lobbyist Turned Regulator Says Europe’s Big Tech Rules Have Gone Too Far
item.description: Aura Salla was once the tech giant’s top lobbyist in Brussels. Now, her presence as a regulator in the European Parliament is proving controversial.

item.title: Best Dog Accessories (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From dog beds to pup backpacks, we’ve had our furry best friends try it all. These dog accessories lead the pack.

item.title: Heroku CEO Bob Wise departs
item.description: Bob Wise, the CEO of Heroku, Salesforce’s cloud platform as a service (PaaS), has left. A Salesforce spokesperson confirmed the news to TechCrunch in ...

item.title: How to Design a Real-Life Hot Wheels Loop
item.description: You should absolutely not build this thing. But it’s still fun to think through the physics.

item.title: FTC reportedly begins investigating Microsoft’s cloud business practices
item.description: The FTC is reportedly readying an investigation into whether Microsoft used anti-competitive tactics to maintain a dominant position in the cloud mark...

item.title: Some of Substack’s Biggest Writers Rely On AI Writing Tools
item.description: An analysis of Substack’s top newsletters estimated that around 10 percent publish AI-generated or AI-assisted content.

item.title: The First Crispr Treatment Is Making Its Way to Patients
item.description: It’s been a year since the gene-editing treatment Casgevy was approved for sickle cell disease and a related blood disorder. It’s finally being infuse...

item.title: Tech leaders recommend colleagues for Trump’s cabinet
item.description: Tech executives have been trying to influence the incoming Trump administration to appoint Silicon Valley insiders for cabinet positions, The New York...

item.title: Musk’s amended lawsuit against OpenAI names Microsoft as defendant
item.description: Elon Musk’s lawsuit against OpenAI accusing the company of abandoning its non-profit mission was withdrawn in July, only to be revived in August. Now,...
